job.title: Data Scientist
job.description:
Job Description
Budweiser. Bud Light. Stella Artois. Michelob ULTRA. That’s right, over 100 of America’s most loved brands, to be exact. But there’s so much more to us than our top-notch portfolio of beers, seltzers, and more. We believe our people are our greatest asset, and we’re looking for people like you to join our shared dream of bringing people together for a better world. Are you up for the Challenge?
In the role as Data Scientist you will own data structure and analysis for all new data science strategic processes and drive future data structure and platform solutions to ensure optimized performance and reliability of required data. You will assist the Data Science Team with data requirements to ensure efficient and effective data flow, align with the Data Science Team members on a strategic vision and plan for new technology systems and applications solution opportunities and work with Global TechSupply on a new technology roadmap and initiatives for the North America Zone.
Data analysis of key processes to determine improvement opportunities either through process change or automated process control.
Process modeling and automated process control algorithm building and enhancements utilizing 3rd party solutions such as Sorba AI or Bonsai AI tools
Data management and utilization of all data sources (Historian, BPA, etc.) to provide a full data analysis capability
Meet and work with multiple process SMEs to understand the process capability, requirements, and targets that the data science can focus and improve on.
Project Management of key Brewery of the Future initiatives within the Data Science Strategy
Job Qualifications
Bachelors degree in a Computer Information Systems, Computer Science, or significant demonstration of experience with databases, datasets, stored procedure creation, data views, and tools to visualiz data (Power BI, SSRS, etc.)
At least 5 years of experience with a focus on data organization, analysis, and visualization
Preferred working knowledge of standard database platforms (MSSQL, Oracle, Sybase) & their development tools (SSMS, Toad, etc.)
Passion for delivering business/operation value by creating excellent solutions
Excellent analytical and problem solving skills, combined with strong business judgement and an ability to present analysis in a clear and compelling manner
Passion for building a business/operation intelligence skillset
A complete Business Intelligence skill stack, from query to dashboard
Proactive mind set with a strong sense of personal ownership
Excellent time management and prioritization skills
Interest in user experience and design thinking
Understanding use of metrics and KPls and how to use them to guide a Supply Chain Operations
Experience participating in Agile development
Why Anheuser-Busch
Anheuser-Busch is here for the times that matter. The moments where we celebrate, defy challenges, dream of the brighter future we are building today– and all the moments in between. We are a company that brings people together for richer conversations, sweeter celebrations and stronger communities.
Challenge Accepted! Apply Today!
Benefits
We offer generous benefit plan options that can be tailored for your unique needs and wellbeing and are effective on day 1. Here are just a few:
Health benefits including Medical, Dental, Vision, Wellness and Tax-Advantaged Savings and Spending Accounts
Life Insurance and Disability Income Protection
Generous Parental Leave and FMLA policies
401(k) Retirement Savings options with a generous company matching contribution of up to 8.5%
Chance to work in a fast-paced environment among a company of owners
Free Beer!
Job Function
Supply
Primary Location
United States-Missouri-St. Louis-A-B Headquarters Complex
Schedule
Full-time
Job Type
Permanent
Salary
$100,000.0 - $112,500.0
Posting Date
Sep 7, 2021
EEO Statement
As the leading global brewer, Anheuser-Busch InBev is committed to finding innovative ways to continually improve. It's this kind of thinking that creates a unique work environment by rewarding talent, celebrating diversity and encouraging forward thinking. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability status or any other characteristic protected by applicable law.
